ComicInfo.Summary: Waterworks: Aspen finds herself in a place she never thought she would be--fighting the Black with Maylander and Killian, her two oldest enemies, as her allies. As Aspen is battling Rahger, her father and leader of the Black, Killian faces off against his old friend Casque. As if things weren't tumultuous enough, Kiani and her forces show up to cause even more mayhem.
ComicInfo.Title: Waterworks
